name: stoic2b
params: wff w0, wff w1, wff w2, wff w3
comment: Stoic logic Thema 2 version b. See ~ stoic2a . Version b is with the phrase "or both". We already have this rule as ~ mpd3an3 , so here we prove the equivalence and discourage its use. (New usage is discouraged.) (Contributed by David A. Wheeler, 17-Feb-2019.)
